Title: Belleville Cop
Writer: Rachid Bouchareb (scenario and dialogue), Larry Gross (scenario and dialogue), Marion Doussot (adaptation), Rachid Bouchareb (adaptation), Rachid Bouchareb (original idea)
Actors: Omar Sy, Luis Guzmán, Biyouna, Diem Nguyen
Plot: When a childhood friend from Miami gets killed after he comes to warn of encroaching drug gangs, Baaba moves to Miami and teams up with a local officer to bring down the criminals.
